about_the_game:
Enhance the emotional depth of your game with the Withered Gods - Torrential Rain Music Pack. This music pack is expertly crafted to create poignant and somber scenes, perfect for game over screens, the passing of a character, or any moment that requires a touch of melancholy.

 

Features:

■ Wide Variety of Instrumentation: From synths and plucked guitars to 5-string basses and detuned pianos, this pack offers a diverse range of sounds to suit various emotional tones.

 

■ Versatile Tracks: Each track is designed to evoke deep emotions, making it suitable for a variety of in-game scenarios.

Add an emotional layer to your game with the Withered Gods - Torrential Rain Music Pack.

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

【Tracks (10 songs)】

 

・A Forgotten Time

・Abyss of Solitude

・Cold Feeling

・Echoes from a Distant Shore

・Icarus

・Lovey

・Melancholy Reverie

・Torrential Rain

・Two Thirds

・Veil of Midnight

 -----------------------------------------------------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
